 1993-15451993-07-210,  ,  EIC,  , 
PrecisCANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS (giving effect to the changes resulting from the passage of Bill C-76) eliminating the six month interest-free period currently granted to full-time students upon their ceasing full-time studies and allowing the Minister to prescribe the necessary forms used in the Program rather than having the forms prescribed by regulation of the Governor in Council, effective August 1, 1993.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1993-0392 Publication Date: 1993-08-11
Attachments
